item.title: Reading and Writing to Know
item.description: Reading to Know Choose your content. Some books [and articles] are not worth the effort. Sometimes you just don’t care whether you’ll remember what you’ve read. But even if you don’t remember the specifics, the effect on your model of the world persists. As your mental model evolves, re-reading books is beneficial because the material compiles differently. When reading, annotate connections from previous knowledge, unanswered questions and unjustified assumptions.
